channel.title: Posts on Summer breeze
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Summer breeze

item.title: Dump mysql practices
item.description: Dump without heavily affecting performance: mysqldump -u USER -p --single-transaction --quick --lock-tables=false DATABASE | gzip > OUTPUT.gz Use this when you want to dumb data while the application is still serving, for example backing up database

item.title: Why Summer breeze?
item.description: I think of this name mostly because I’ve heard of the song itself by Seals & Crofts, the tune is actually pretty popular, I guess you’ll realize it easily:
